publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2726.2 David Mundell: Protection of Wild Mammals (Scotland) Bill-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2726) in the name of Bristow Muldoon, leave out from "agrees" to end and insert "does not agree that the Protection of Wild Mammals (Scotland) Bill be passed because it does not achieve the objectives set for it at Stage 1 by its sponsors."
